channel.title: Fil Bezerianos | Public Hub
channel.description: Recent content on Fil Bezerianos | Public Hub

item.title: Certifications and Credentials
item.description:
I am continuously striving to expand my knowledge and skills, acquiring a diverse array of academic qualifications and professional certifications. I view each step in my educational journey not just as a milestone, but a foundation for further growth.

From prestigious universities to industry-leading certifications, the credentials below represent my pursuit and deep commitment to lifelong learning.

Institution Subject
Stanford University Product Management Accelerated Program, Stanford University Online
Cornell University AI Strategy, eCornell
MIT Technology and Innovation Acceleration Program, MIT xPro
MIT Digital Transformation: Platform Strategies for Success, MIT Sloan Executive Education
MIT Organisational Design for Digital Transformation, MIT Sloan School of Management
Columbia Business School Digital Strategies for Business: Leading the Next Generation Enterprise
City University of London Risk Management in Banking and Finance
Imperial College MSc In Electrical Engineering, Control Systems

Throughout my career, I have pursued and achieved multiple technical and business certifications, consistently seeking opportunities to expand my skills.

item.title: AI as a Junior Employee
item.description: AI systems have become very capable but they are like a junior employee, where if left unattended may cause more work than deliver value. The next wave of autonomous AI agents may change this.

item.title: AI-Powered Property Photo Analyser
item.description: Property Visual Finder uses a fine-tuned vision AI model to analyse property photos and identify specific features, enabling advanced, data-driven property ranking, and searches based on visual characteristics.

item.title: Product Transformation and Delivery
item.description: Leading impactful initiatives to bring ideas to life. I have worked with diverse organisations across industries to design modern product structures and deliver effective and innovative solutions on time and within budget.

item.title: Technology and Product Modernisation
item.description: Driving innovation and transformation through cutting-edge modernisation programs. I have delivered scalable solutions, enhanced user experiences, and aligned business strategies with evolving market demands.

item.title: Cloud Migration Strategy AI Tool
item.description: An AI-powered tool designed to determine the optimal Cloud migration strategy for applications. It analyses application details and aligns them with the organisation’s Cloud goals to deliver tailored recommendations.

item.title: Relationships Mapping and Visualisation Tool
item.description: A tool that leverages AI to transform unstructured interview data into a visual overview diagram, expediting the analysis of structures and processes and enabling the identification of inefficiencies.

item.title: Dad Jokes Chatty
item.description: PunGPT is personal project built for fun and powered by a lightweight LLaMA model, it delivers puns and dad jokes on demand, and sometimes when you least expect them. All wrapped in a clean, familiar chat UI.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
As a professional I stand at the intersection of technology and business, specialising in designing, developing and implementing solutions to drive tangible business outcomes. I have worked with several industry-leading enterprises and exceptionally talented individuals to transform technical potential into substantial business value and reshape entire organisations.

Currently, I am a Product Management Lead focusing on Data, AI and Cloud solutions.

Cross-Industry Experience

Throughout my career, I have had the privilege of working across diverse industries, delivering impactful solutions to address the unique challenges of each sector. This breadth of experience has not only enhanced my ability to adapt to varying business environments but also deepened my understanding of how technology serves as a transformative force.

item.title: The Rise of Task-Specific Models
item.description: While AI text-generation solutions offer multiple benefits across multiple workflows and can be applied to different solution types, they are not always the optimal choice.

item.title: Beyond the AI Model
item.description: The model(s) used by an AI solution are a core component and should be managed accordingly, e.g. through versioning. However, there are some other components that integrate with the AI solution, contributing to its IP and the overall value. These components must also be treated as essential elements of the solution.

item.title: AI Implementation and User Experience
item.description: Many organisations have rushed into “integrating” AI into their processes and products. However the successful integration of AI into existing workflows requires careful planning and an intentional approach. Without this, organisations risking disrupting the user experience, potentially becoming an additional tool that users must manage, rather than genuinely helpful enhancement.

item.title: Embedding AI Into Enterprise
item.description: Embedding AI into enterprise workflows can be a complex and presents several unique challenges, with of them being AI’s non-deterministic nature. Unlike traditional systems that produce predictable, rule-based outputs, AI systems operate with a level of uncertainty and variability. This non-determinism can introduce issues when integrating AI into established workflows. The adoption approach and the leadership team play an important role in successfully adopting AI within the organisation.

item.title: The Dominant Strategy in Game Theory and AI
item.description: One of the most classic examples of Game Theory is the Prisoner’s Dilemma, which illustrates the conflict between individual rationality and collective rationality. In this article, we will explore what game theory acn teach us about AI adoption and how the dominant strategy may lead to a race to the bottom.

item.title: A.I. = Accelerate Inefficiencies
item.description: AI is transforming the business and technology landscape, promising efficiency, innovation and better decision-making. However, for organisations already struggling with technology-business misalignment, structural and operational inefficiencies and lack of governance, AI will accelerate and amplify these challenges.

item.title: Blending AI and Product Management
item.description: The introduction of AI into product development represents a transformative shift in how products are developed, managed and evolved. AI product phases are integrating into various stages of the product management lifecycle. Successfully aligning and integrating the AI product management phases into product management lifecycle, will accelerate the pace of innovation and introduce new capabilities, but may also introduce new challenges.

item.title: ML Model Metrics and Transformation
item.description: The concept of Satisfying and Optimising metrics in Machine Learning emerges as a powerful approach that is applicable to Enterprise and Digital Transformations. In this article, we explore how this approach can be applied to identify the appropriate metrics to satisfy or optimise in the context of Transformation and some risks the Organisations must be aware.

item.title: From Project to Product, from Product to Platform
item.description: There is not a linear connection between the models in the form of going from Project to Product, and from Product to Platform. The key idea is that the three models could run in parallel depending on the transformation initiatives, serving different purposes and focusing on achieving different goals and outcomes.

item.title: System Theory and Enterprise Transformation
item.description: Viewing the Enterprise as a System can help an organisation to understand their Transformation (e.g. Business, Digital etc.) better and adopt a more holistic and integrated approach to it. In this article I will expand on this approach and I will provide ideas on how specific frameworks and theories can be leveraged to help understand better the dynamics inside an organisation during a Transformational journey, always in alignment with the view of the Enterprise as a System.

item.title: Service Mesh at the Edge
item.description: As Enterprises are under pressure to increase agility and speed to delivery, microservices and containers adoption continues to grow rapidly and faster than expected. There are many articles about the benefits of containerization, e.g. portability (write once, run anywhere), resource efficiencies and faster application start-up times.
